product_name: Green Guru Kickstand Cooler Trunk Bag
long_description: Sourced from upcycled materials and stitched together with high-quality worksmanship, the Green Guru Kickstand Cooler Trunk Bag mounts on your rear rack and keeps food insulated while you ride.
short_description: Sourced from upcycled materials and stitched together with high-quality worksmanship, the Green Guru Kickstand Cooler Trunk Bag mounts on your rear rack and keeps food insulated while you ride.
